thread.title: OCC Names First Ever Chief Risk Officer
thread.title_full: OCC Names First Ever Chief Risk Officer

author: Orrick - Structured Finance Group
title: OCC Names First Ever Chief Risk Officer
text:
OCC Names First Ever Chief Risk Officer more+ Contact 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: <iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=5c528bbc-ced8-435d-961f-a18e16088646" width="100%" height="620" frameborder="1" style="border: 2px solid #ccc; overflow-x:hidden !important; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="auto"></iframe> 
On August 6, the OCC named Linda Cunningham as its first Chief Risk Officer. Ms. Cunningham will lead the agency’s newly created Office of Enterprise Risk management and will report directly to the Comptroller of the Currency. Release . 
DISCLAIMER: Because of the generality of this update, the information provided herein may not be applicable in all situations and should not be acted upon without specific legal advice based on particular situations.
